Drivable area detection documentation
=====================================

.. Add your content using ``reStructuredText`` syntax. See the
.. `reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
.. documentation for details.

This project provides a deep learning-based solution for multiclass lane detection, designed for autonomous driving applications. It includes a U-Net model for semantic segmentation, custom dataset handling, and training utilities to detect background, driveable areas, and lane markings in images. Implemented by `Team07 <https://github.com/orgs/SEAME-pt/teams/team07>`_

     For more details, explore the following sections:


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   modules
   reports

.. ==========
